We received the 2025-2026 Property Renewal Binder and was able to issue the Property Certificate of Insurance for Vordano Realty Trust. Attached is the Property Certificate of Insurance that we submitted today, and the below email is verification that they have received the Certificate of Insurance. 

 

Thank you,

Jay Davis 

Account Executive, Commercial Insurance

Direct: (212) 293-6030

jay.davis@​epicbrokers.​com <mailto:jay.davis@?epicbrokers.?com> 

epicbrokers.com | CA License 0B29370

1140 Avenue of Americas, 8th Fl, New York, NY 10036
